verses.content: Chun, pindan sûngrila in- thawk chun rawl inringtakin, vântirko pasarihai kuoma chun, “Fe unla, Pathien lunginsenna berbuhai chu hnuoiah bunthla ro,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, a hmasatak chu a feh a, a berbu chu hnuoiah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, Sahrâng inchikna nei- hai le a lim chibai bûkhai chunga chun pânsie natakin ân chang tah a.
Chun, a pahnina chun a berbu chu tuisuorietah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, mithi thisen angin thi- senin ân chang tah a; chun, thilhring tinrêng tuisuorieta umhai chu an thi ta vawng a.
Chun, a pathumna chun a berbu chu vadungahai le tuikhurahai a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, thisenin ân chang tah a.
Chun, tui vântirko chun, “Nang Mi Inthieng, hieng anga ro i rêl leiin, nang um zing le um tah, i fel ie.
Anni chun mi inthienghai le zâwlneihai thisen an insuoh a; chun, nangin dâwn dinga thisen ma i pêk thung hi dâwn tlâk an ni hrim deh,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, mâichâm chun, “Anih, Aw Lalpa Pathien, Iengkimthawthei, i rorêlhai chu ân dikin a fel a nih,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, a palina chun a berbu chu nisaah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, nisa chu meia mihriem em ût dingin thilthawtheina an pêk a.
Chuongchun, mihai chu lumtaka em ûtin an um a, chuong hremna chunga thuneitu Pathien hming chu an hrilsiet a, ama chawimawi dingin an sim chuong nawh.
Chun, a pangana chun a berbu chu Sahrâng lalṭhungphaah a bun- thlâk a; chuongchun, a ram chu a hung inthim ta vawng a. Chun, an nat leiin an lei an se a,
an nahai le an pânnahai leiin vâna Pathien chu an hrilsiet a; an thilthawhai chu an sim chuong nawh.

Chun, a parukna chun a berbu chu tuipui Euphratesa chun a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, nisa suokna tieng panga lal hung dinghai ta dinga lampui chu inzosa a hung ni theina dingin, a tui chu a kang intan tah a.
Chun, drakon baua inthawk le Sahrâng baua inthawk le, zâwlnei tehlêm baua inthawk chun thlarau inthiengnaw pathum u ni âwmtak, hung suok ka hmuh a.
Chuong chu khawhri thlarau, thilmak thaw hlakhai an nih. Anni chu Pathien Iengkimthawthei ni ropuia indonaa ṭhuoi khâwm dingin khawvêl po poa lalhai kuomah an feh a.
(Ngai ta, inru angin ka hung ding a nih; inringa a puon dierkei zing chu a hamṭha, chuong naw chun, saruokin lêng a ta, a zamaw hmu rawi an tih).
Hmun pakhat Hebrai ṭawnga Har-Magedon an tia chun an ṭhuoi khâwm tah a.
Chun, a pasarina chun a berbu chu boruokah a bunthlâk a; chuong- chun, pindan sûngrila, Lalṭhungphaa inthawkin, “A kim tah,” tiin rawl inringtak a hung suok a.

Chun, kâwlinlep dâm, rawl dâm, vâninrûm dâm, a hung um tah a, simkhawleihnuoi khawm nasatak- in ân hnîng a, hnuoia mihriem uma inthawk chuong ang hrima nasa a la um ngai nawh, simkhawleihnuoi inhnîng chuong ang lâwma nasa le ropui chu.

Chuongchun, khaw ropui chu hmun thumah a hung inṭheh a, hnam tin khuohai chu a hung chim a; chun, a lunginsen nasatna uoin no chu a kuoma pêk dingin Babulon khaw ropui chu Pathien hmaa hriet zingin a lo um tah a.
Chun, thlierkâr tinrêng a bo ta vawng a, tlânghai khawm a um ta nawh a.
Chun, riel lientak talent tluk raua rik seng, vâna inthawkin mihriemhai chungah a tlah a; chun, mihriemhai chun riela hremna lei chun Pathien an hrilsiet tah a; chu hremna chu a nasa bêk bêk sih a.
